home.title: Voltage
home.subtitle: The Ultimate DIY {energyDrink} Guide
home.description: Create EU-compliant, safe, and powerful energy drinks at home. Precision recipes, cost scaling, and safety verification.

warning.title: Lethal Hazard Warning
warning.message: Pure caffeine is potentially lethal. Precise measurement (0.001g scale) is MANDATORY. This guide complies with EU safety limits. Negligence can cause severe injury or death.

calculator.title: Smart Calculator
calculator.description: Input your desired volume and caffeine strength. We calculate precise powder ratios for perfect batches every time.

flavors.title: Flavor Alchemy
flavors.description: Clone famous recipes or invent your own. Our library ensures chemical safety and flavor stability.

guide.title: Master Guide
guide.description: From sourcing ingredients to preservation techniques. A complete manual for the home energy brewer.
